Test Name: UroVysion Fluorescence In Situ Hybridization (FISH) Test for Recurrent Bladder Cancer
Purpose: To detect recurrent bladder cancer by identifying chromosomal abnormalities in urine cells.
Equipment: UroVysion Bladder Cancer Kit, fluorescence microscope with DAPI/FITC/Texas Red/Aqua filters, hybridization chamber, slide warmer or incubator, Coplin jars
